definitions.definition: A sharp or witty reply , or one which turns an argument against its originator ; a comeback .
examples: He countered her insult with a clever retort .

main_definition: A sharp or witty reply , or one which turns an argument against its originator ; a comeback .

definitions.definition: A flask with a rounded base and a long neck that is bent down and tapered , used to heat a liquid for distillation .
An airtight vessel in which material is subjected to high temperatures in the chemical industry or as part of an industrial manufacturing process, especially during the smelting and forging of metal.

main_definition: ( chemistry ) A flask with a rounded base and a long neck that is bent down and tapered , used to heat a liquid for distillation .
secondary_definitions: An airtight vessel in which material is subjected to high temperatures in the chemical industry or as part of an industrial manufacturing process, especially during the smelting and forging of metal.
